{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

A NEW JHIN SKIN!!!!!
Are the new released skins legacy skins?
no
So they are permanent? I don't get paid for a little while, and really want one of them, I will be fine waiting? They wont go away?
dont worry, they are permanent. Just like the other blood moon skins
What they need is more of these skins, on all of the assasin champs. I'd love to see the artwork, as well as a skin for shacko, or yi

One issue I have with this map is that with the item restrictions there are no Armor items for AD champs.

As AP you have{{item:3157}} for AR and for {{item:3001}} MR if you want to go a bit tanky. As AD you have lots of MR ( {{item:3156}} ,{{item:3814}}  ,{{item:3139}}  ,{{item:3091}}  ) but no AR item other than...{{item:3060}}  I guess?

Yes I know {{item:3047}} is there, but since pretty much all the AD assassins are AD casters and not marksmen it's a little subpar compared to {{item:3111}}  or {{item:3158}}, especially if the other team is a mix of AD and AP

Also, why does {{item:3060}} exist in this gamemode?

Would be cool if you could banner the spirits so that it makes it harder for champs like {{champion:28}}
